parameters.query:
SELECT id as event_id, event_type, project_id,
       payload->>'entity_id' as entity_id,
       payload
FROM events
WHERE event_type = 'PURCHASE_INVOICE_CREATED'
  AND processed_at IS NULL
  AND created_at < now() - interval '2 minutes'
ORDER BY created_at ASC
LIMIT 10;

parameters.query:
SELECT pi.*,
       pi.expense_category::text as expense_cat,
       s.name as supplier_name,
       s.street as supplier_street,
       s.zip_code as supplier_zip,
       s.city as supplier_city,
       s.lexware_contact_id,
       s.id as supplier_id
FROM purchase_invoices pi
JOIN suppliers s ON s.id = pi.supplier_id
WHERE pi.id = '{{ $('Event Data').item.json.purchase_invoice_id }}'::uuid;

parameters.query:
-- Mark input event as processed
DO $$ BEGIN
  UPDATE events SET processed_at = now()
  WHERE id = '{{ $('Event Data').item.json.event_id }}'::uuid;
EXCEPTION WHEN invalid_text_representation THEN NULL;
END $$;

-- Emit LEXWARE_PUSH_COMPLETED event
INSERT INTO events (event_type, project_id, payload, source_system, source_flow, reference_table, reference_id)
VALUES (
  'LEXWARE_PUSH_COMPLETED',
  {{ $('Build Voucher Payload').item.json.project_id ? "'" + $('Build Voucher Payload').item.json.project_id + "'::uuid" : "NULL::uuid" }},
  jsonb_build_object(
    'purchase_invoice_id', '{{ $('Build Voucher Payload').item.json.invoice_id }}',
    'lexware_voucher_id', '{{ $('Create Lexware Voucher').item.json.body.id }}',
    'invoice_number', '{{ $('Build Voucher Payload').item.json.invoice_number }}'
  ),
  'n8n',
  'M6_02_Lexware_Push_Invoice',
  'purchase_invoices',
  '{{ $('Build Voucher Payload').item.json.invoice_id }}'::uuid
)
RETURNING id, event_type::text, project_id;

parameters.query:
-- Mark invoice as error
UPDATE purchase_invoices SET
  lexware_sync_status = 'error',
  lexware_sync_error = '{{ $json.error_message.replace(/'/g, "''").substring(0, 1000) }}'
WHERE id = '{{ $json.invoice_id }}'::uuid;

-- Log error
INSERT INTO lexware_sync_log
  (sync_direction, entity_type, entity_id, action, sync_status, error_message,
   request_payload)
VALUES
  ('push', 'purchase_invoice', '{{ $json.invoice_id }}'::uuid,
   'create', 'error',
   '{{ $json.error_message.replace(/'/g, "''").substring(0, 1000) }}',
   '{{ JSON.stringify($('Build Voucher Payload').item.json.voucher_payload).replace(/'/g, "''") }}'::jsonb);

-- Emit LEXWARE_PUSH_FAILED event
INSERT INTO events (event_type, project_id, payload, source_system, source_flow, reference_table, reference_id)
VALUES (
  'LEXWARE_PUSH_FAILED',
  {{ $json.project_id ? "'" + $json.project_id + "'::uuid" : "NULL::uuid" }},
  jsonb_build_object(
    'purchase_invoice_id', '{{ $json.invoice_id }}',
    'invoice_number', '{{ $json.invoice_number }}',
    'error', '{{ $json.error_message.replace(/'/g, "''").substring(0, 500) }}'
  ),
  'n8n',
  'M6_02_Lexware_Push_Invoice',
  'purchase_invoices',
  '{{ $json.invoice_id }}'::uuid
);
